rankings.title: OSHA Electronic Recordkeeping Threshold and Workplace Safety: RDD at 100 Employees
conditions: ideally a “difference-in-discontinuities” using pre-2024 placebo cutoffs or pre-period outcomes to separate reporting from true injury changes

rankings.title: Federal Student Loan Limits and College Completion: RDD at the Dependent/Independent Threshold
conditions: administrative aid + borrowing data with exact DOB/aid-year timing
a design that isolates loan-limit exposure—e.g.
focusing on students just above Pell cutoffs or institutions with predictable packaging
strong placebo tests for outcomes not tied to loan limits
